text:
I would like to be able to do the diff with to files like the linux diff 
program.

Exemple:
<Diff path1="File1" path2="File2" output="outputfile.txt"/>
creator: frodrish@hotmail.com
stevel@apache.org
text: *** Bug 9536 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
Something like this should be in an antlib, but not
in ant-core. Marking as wontfix.
